text: wakama 'awhayna 'iilaa al'anbia' min qablik -ayha alnby- 'awhayna 'iilayk qranana min endna, ma kunt tadri qablih ma alkutub alssabiqat wala al'iiman wala alshraye al'ilhy? wlkn jaealna alquran dia'an lilnaas nahdi bih man nasha' min eibadina 'iilaa alsirat almstqym. wa'iinak -ayha alrswl- latadull waturshid bi'iidhn allah 'iilaa sirat mstqym- wahu al'islam- sirat allah aladhi lah mulk jmye ma fi alsmwat wama fi alard, la sharik lah fi dhalik. 'alaa 'iilaa allh- 'ayuha alnas- tarjie jmye amwrkm min alkhayr walshr, fyjazy kla bemlh: 'iina khyrana fkhyr, wa'iin shrana fshr
